April 11, 1903 D Lewisham Contest
Lewisham Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
lewisham-contest
None
Gems of Welsh Melody
The Cedars, Belmont Hill, Lee, Lewisham, Greater London, England, UK
Prizes - 1st £6, challenge cup,trombone,three bottle 'Tantalus' stand and book. 2nd £4, silver cup, clock and book. 3rd £3, box of cigars and book. 4th £2. 1st annual contest promoted by Lewisham Borough Band. 12 bands competed
